howItWorks.title: HOW IT WORKS
howItWorks.subtitle: Create and launch a quiz in 3 steps

1.title: Create your quiz
1.description: Add your questions, choose the types of questions and personalize the design. You can also import questions from our library.

2.title: Share the code
2.description: Once your quiz is ready, a unique code is generated. Share this code with your participants to allow them to join.

3.title: Launch and play
3.description: When everyone is ready, launch the quiz! The questions are displayed in real time on all devices with a countdown.
